title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: The April fool prank done by bitcointalk forum was hit prank to everyone including moderators. After many attempts I have to post without achieving the captcha and immediately I saw this user is spam low quality post with red tag on it, I say na waoo! This people don start again, they should not block my account. I refused to do any other post for two days but I never knew it was prank. Fair well prank
